flow.doc:description: This is the simpliest entry point to start the excecution of your Template Here you should: * Define any inbound endpoint * Handle any input parameter and transform it into the expected format by the mainFlow Here you should not: * Run validations against external systems * Choose flow of your application based on input parameters
